description: Enables you to programmatically list all data pipelines for the provided Amazon Web Services Supply Chain instance.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services Supply Chain instance identifier.

nested_items.name: flows
nested_items.description: The response parameters for ListDataIntegrationFlows.

nested_items.name: instanceId
nested_items.description: The DataIntegrationFlow instance ID.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The DataIntegrationFlow name.

nested_items.name: sources
nested_items.description: The DataIntegrationFlow source configurations.

nested_items.name: sourceType
nested_items.description: The DataIntegrationFlow source type.

nested_items.name: sourceName
nested_items.description: The DataIntegrationFlow source name that can be used as table alias in SQL transformation query.

nested_items.name: bucketName
nested_items.description: The bucketName of the S3 source objects.

nested_items.name: prefix
nested_items.description: The prefix of the S3 source objects. To trigger data ingestion, S3 files need to be put under s3://bucketName/prefix/.

nested_items.name: fileType
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 file type in S3 options.

nested_items.name: datasetSource
nested_items.description: The dataset DataIntegrationFlow source.

nested_items.name: datasetIdentifier
nested_items.description: The ARN of the dataset.

nested_items.name: loadType
nested_items.description: The target dataset's data load type. This only affects how source S3 files are selected in the S3-to-dataset flow.

nested_items.name: dedupeRecords
nested_items.description: The option to perform deduplication on data records sharing same primary key values. If disabled, transformed data with duplicate primary key values will ingest into dataset, for datasets within asc namespace, such duplicates will cause ingestion fail. If enabled without dedupeStrategy, deduplication is done by retaining a random data record among those sharing the same primary key values. If enabled with dedupeStragtegy, the deduplication is done following the strategy.

nested_items.name: dedupeStrategy
nested_items.description: The deduplication strategy to dedupe the data records sharing same primary key values of the target dataset. This strategy only applies to target dataset with primary keys and with dedupeRecords option enabled. If transformed data still got duplicates after the dedupeStrategy evaluation, a random data record is chosen to be retained.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the deduplication strategy.

nested_items.name: fieldPriority
nested_items.description: The field priority deduplication strategy.

nested_items.name: fields
nested_items.description: The list of field names and their sort order for deduplication, arranged in descending priority from highest to lowest.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the deduplication field. Must exist in the dataset and not be a primary key.

nested_items.name: sortOrder
nested_items.description: The sort order for the deduplication field.

nested_items.name: transformation
nested_items.description: The DataIntegrationFlow transformation configurations.

nested_items.name: transformationType
nested_items.description: The DataIntegrationFlow transformation type.

nested_items.name: sqlTransformation
nested_items.description: The SQL DataIntegrationFlow transformation configuration.

nested_items.name: query
nested_items.description: The transformation SQL query body based on SparkSQL.

nested_items.name: targetType
nested_items.description: The DataIntegrationFlow target type.

nested_items.name: bucketName
nested_items.description: The bucketName of the S3 target objects.

nested_items.name: prefix
nested_items.description: The prefix of the S3 target objects.

nested_items.name: fileType
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 file type in S3 options.

nested_items.name: datasetTarget
nested_items.description: The dataset DataIntegrationFlow target. Note that for AWS Supply Chain dataset under asc namespace, it has a connection_id internal field that is not allowed to be provided by client directly, they will be auto populated.

nested_items.name: datasetIdentifier
nested_items.description: The dataset ARN.

nested_items.name: loadType
nested_items.description: The target dataset's data load type. This only affects how source S3 files are selected in the S3-to-dataset flow.

nested_items.name: dedupeRecords
nested_items.description: The option to perform deduplication on data records sharing same primary key values. If disabled, transformed data with duplicate primary key values will ingest into dataset, for datasets within asc namespace, such duplicates will cause ingestion fail. If enabled without dedupeStrategy, deduplication is done by retaining a random data record among those sharing the same primary key values. If enabled with dedupeStragtegy, the deduplication is done following the strategy.

nested_items.name: dedupeStrategy
nested_items.description: The deduplication strategy to dedupe the data records sharing same primary key values of the target dataset. This strategy only applies to target dataset with primary keys and with dedupeRecords option enabled. If transformed data still got duplicates after the dedupeStrategy evaluation, a random data record is chosen to be retained.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the deduplication strategy.

nested_items.name: fieldPriority
nested_items.description: The field priority deduplication strategy.

nested_items.name: fields
nested_items.description: The list of field names and their sort order for deduplication, arranged in descending priority from highest to lowest.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the deduplication field. Must exist in the dataset and not be a primary key.

nested_items.name: sortOrder
nested_items.description: The sort order for the deduplication field.

nested_items.name: createdTime
nested_items.description: The DataIntegrationFlow creation timestamp.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The DataIntegrationFlow last modified timestamp.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token to fetch the next page of the DataIntegrationFlows.
